item.title: Crafting a Robust and Maintainable C Makefile
item.description: I’m pretty pedantic about the quality of my code, and I like to keep my projects organized and maintainable. One of the tools that I use to achieve this is GNU Make, which is a powerful build system that can be used to automate the process of compiling and linking C programs. In this post, I will show you how to create a simple and robust Makefile template that can be used in your C projects.
